abstract.para: A dataset containing all occurrences available in GBIF matching the query: Country: Brazil TaxonKey: Mimosa L. The dataset includes records from the following constituent datasets. The full metadata for each constituent is also included in this archive: 1 records from Aranzadi Zientzi Elkartea 1 records from Auckland Museum Botany Collection 1 records from herbario 1 records from DAV UC Davis Center for Plant Diversity 1 records from United States National Plant Germplasm System Collection 1 records from PlantBank Records 1 records from Universidad de Oviedo. Departamento de Biología de Organismos y Sistemas: FCO-Briof 1 records from Lund Botanical Museum (LD) 1 records from University of Florida Herbarium (FLAS) 1 records from University of Michigan Herbarium 1 records from Sammlung Ernst Ule sinenumero Herbarium Hamburgense HBG 1 records from Xiloteca del IANIGLA (IANIGLA-CCT CONICET Mendoza): XIAM. 1 records from UTEP Plants (Arctos) 1 records from University of North Carolina Chapel Hill Herbarium 1 records from Herbario Gaspar Xuarez (BAA) - Facultad de Agronomía - Universidad de Buenos Aires 1 records from Bolivian Mimosa (Leguminosae, Mimosoideae): three new species and a species checklist 1 records from Manchester Museum, University of Manchester, Botany Collection 1 records from UCBG TAPIR Provider 1 records from Estonian University of Life Sciences 1 records from Fungus Collections at Staatliches Museum für Naturkunde Karlsruhe (Herbarium KR) 2 records from The AAU Herbarium Database 2 records from VIT Herbarium - Vascular Plants (The Natural History Museum of Alava) 3 records from MGC Herbarium of University of Malaga (Spain): MGC-Cormof dataset 3 records from SINGER Coordinator 3 records from Geographically tagged INSDC sequences 3 records from University of British Columbia Herbarium (UBC) - Vascular Plant Collection 3 records from Modelación de la distribución real y potencial de especies de dos géneros de Mimosoideae: Mimosa y Prosopis (Leguminosae) en México 3 records from Computarización de la xiloteca Dr. Faustino Miranda del Instituto de Ecología, AC 4 records from Universidad de Oviedo. Departamento de Biología de Organismos y Sistemas: FCO 4 records from Actualización de las bases de datos del Herbario XAL.
